thread.section_title: willisorchards.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of willisorchards.com | willisorchards.com
thread.title: Matthew

author: Matthew
title: Matthew
text:
I purchased a number of fruit and nut trees from willisorchards.com. Overall, they seem to be healthy, although one of my hickories had a broken tap root. Also, it is a little early in the process to evaluate some of them, as they haven't started leafing out yet.
I selected the option to have them be delivered in Spring, since I ordered them in mid-winter. This is a great option to have, although I didn't know when they were going to be arriving.
I'm excited for my trees to grow! I should follow up on this in 3 to 8 years, but that's probably not going to happen.
